银团贷款(syndicated loan)是国际金融市场上比较成熟的一种业务模式,通常指两家或两家以上的银行,依据同样的贷款条件,并使用共同的贷款协议,向借款人发放并由一家.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, via late Latin from Greek sundikos, from sun- 'together' + dikē 'justice'

means.word_mean: 1. one appointed to represent a city or university or corporation in business transactions
